title: Scratch Addons addon manifest
description: The manifest that describes an addon.

name.description: The name of the addon. Make sure that the the first word is capital and the rest of the words are not. Addon names should be a noun, not a verb.

description.description: The description of the addon. Describe what the addon does and how to use it. Make sure to leave a period at the end of the description.

credits.description: An array containing credits to the authors/contributors of the addon.

name.description: The name of the credited person.

link.description: The link relevant to the credit.

id.description: The ID for the credit. Required if note is in use.

userscripts.description: An array of userscripts that run based on their url matches.

runAtComplete.description: Determines whether the addon should be run after the document is complete loading. Defaults to true, so set to false and the scripts will run earlier.

icon.description: The name of the popup icon.

component.description: The file of the popup component.

versionAdded.description: The version that introduced the addon.

tags.description: Tags which are used for filtering and badges on the settings page.

enabledByDefault.description: If true, the addon will be enabled when the extension is first installed. If you want your addon to be enabled by default, mention in your pr.

oneOf.description: A match rule for any URL on Scratch origin. The script will execute will execute in all pages.
A RegEx match rule. Patterns starting with https will be treated as an absolute RegEx pattern, and patterns that don't start will be treated as an relative RegEx pattern.
An array that contains match rules. The script will execute if it matches any of the rules.
